TITLE: Initializing and Using BrowserStack Local in Node.js
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to create an instance of BrowserStack Local, start it with arguments, check if it's running, and stop it. Requires a BrowserStack access key.
SOURCE: https://github.com/browserstack/browserstack-local-nodejs/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
var browserstack = require('browserstack-local');

//creates an instance of Local
var bs_local = new browserstack.Local();

// replace <browserstack-accesskey> with your key. You can also set an environment variable - "BROWSERSTACK_ACCESS_KEY".
var bs_local_args = { 'key': '<browserstack-accesskey>' };

// starts the Local instance with the required arguments
bs_local.start(bs_local_args, function() {
  console.log("Started BrowserStackLocal");

  // check if BrowserStack local instance is running
  console.log(bs_local.isRunning());

  // stop the Local instance
  bs_local.stop(function() {
    console.log("Stopped BrowserStackLocal");
  });
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing BrowserStack Local Node.js Package
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to install the browserstack-local package using npm.
SOURCE: https://github.com/browserstack/browserstack-local-nodejs/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install browserstack-local
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Local Identifier for Multiple BrowserStack Local Connections
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to set a unique local identifier when running multiple simultaneous BrowserStack Local testing connections.
SOURCE: https://github.com/browserstack/browserstack-local-nodejs/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
bs_local_args = { 'key': '<browserstack-accesskey>', 'localIdentifier': 'randomstring' }
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Proxy Settings for BrowserStack Local
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to set up proxy settings for BrowserStack Local, including host, port, authentication, and CA certificate.
SOURCE: https://github.com/browserstack/browserstack-local-nodejs/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
bs_local_args = { 'key': '<browserstack-accesskey>', 'proxyHost': '127.0.0.1', 'proxyPort': '8000', 'proxyUser': 'user', 'proxyPass': 'password', 'useCaCertificate': '/Users/test/cert.pem' }
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Forcing All Traffic Through Local Machine in BrowserStack Local
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to route all traffic through the local machine when using BrowserStack Local.
SOURCE: https://github.com/browserstack/browserstack-local-nodejs/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
bs_local_args = { 'key': '<browserstack-accesskey>', 'forceLocal': 'true' }
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Up BrowserStack Local for Folder Testing
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to configure BrowserStack Local to test a local folder instead of an internal server by specifying the folder path.
SOURCE: https://github.com/browserstack/browserstack-local-nodejs/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
bs_local_args = { 'key': '<browserstack-accesskey>', 'f': '/my/awesome/folder' }
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Up Local Proxy for BrowserStack Local Testing
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to configure a local proxy for BrowserStack Local testing, including host, port, and authentication.
SOURCE: https://github.com/browserstack/browserstack-local-nodejs/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
bs_local_args = { 'key': '<browserstack-accesskey>', 'localProxyHost': '127.0.0.1', 'localProxyPort': '8000', 'localProxyUser': 'user', 'localProxyPass': 'password' }
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring BrowserStack Local for Automate-Only Testing
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to disable local testing for Live and Screenshots, enabling only Automate testing.
SOURCE: https://github.com/browserstack/browserstack-local-nodejs/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
bs_local_args = { 'key': '<browserstack-accesskey>', 'onlyAutomate': 'true' }
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring BrowserStack Local with Force Start Option
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to force start BrowserStack Local, which will kill other running instances.
SOURCE: https://github.com/browserstack/browserstack-local-nodejs/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
bs_local_args = { 'key': '<browserstack-accesskey>', 'force': 'true' }
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring PAC (Proxy Auto-Configuration) for BrowserStack Local
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to use a PAC (Proxy Auto-Configuration) file with BrowserStack Local by specifying the file's absolute path.
SOURCE: https://github.com/browserstack/browserstack-local-nodejs/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
bs_local_args = { 'key': '<browserstack-accesskey>', 'pac-file': '<pac_file_abs_path>' }
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring BrowserStack Local with Verbose Logging
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to enable verbose logging when starting BrowserStack Local. The 'verbose' option can be set to '1', '2', '3', or 'true'.
SOURCE: https://github.com/browserstack/browserstack-local-nodejs/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
bs_local_args = { 'key': '<browserstack-accesskey>', 'verbose': 'true' }
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Log File for BrowserStack Local
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to specify a custom log file path for BrowserStack Local when running with verbose logging enabled.
SOURCE: https://github.com/browserstack/browserstack-local-nodejs/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_12

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
bs_local_args = { 'key': '<browserstack-accesskey>', 'verbose': 'true', 'logFile': '/browserstack/logs.txt' }
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Specifying Custom Binary Path for BrowserStack Local
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to override the default BrowserStack Local binary path by specifying a custom path.
SOURCE: https://github.com/browserstack/browserstack-local-nodejs/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_11

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
bs_local_args = { 'key': '<browserstack-accesskey>', 'binarypath': '/browserstack/BrowserStackLocal' }
```
